subtitleNullable: Dataset of 18K images of 15 different traffic signs.
descriptionNullable:
Dataset:
1.	Collect 120-180 images for each traffic sign.

2.	Perform Data Augmentation on the traffic signs:
     a.	High Brightness
     b.	Low Brightness
     c.	Gaussian Blur (3x3 kernel)
     d.	Zoom in (25%)
     e.	Rotate Right (angle of 20)
     f.	        Rotate Left (angle of -20)
3.	After collecting all the samples and performing data augmentation there will be between 12600-18900 images in the dataset.

4.	The division of the Dataset is: 10% Testing, 90% Training (You can divide the training to validation and train however you like)

5.	Images size is 50x50.

The Traffic signs are:
1.	Stop Sign.
2.	Yield Sign.
3.	Access Denied Sign.
4.	Close Road Sign.
5.	30 Speed Limit Sign.
6.	50 Speed Limit Sign.
7.	70 Speed Limit Sign.
8.	Roundabout Sign.
9.	Go Left Sign.
10.	Go Right Sign.
11.	One Way Road Sign.
12.	Bumper Ahead Sign.
13.	Parking Sign.
14.	Pedestrian Cross Walk Sign.
15.	 Uneven Road Sign.
title: Traffic Signs Dataset
subtitle: Dataset of 18K images of 15 different traffic signs.
description:
Dataset:
1.	Collect 120-180 images for each traffic sign.

2.	Perform Data Augmentation on the traffic signs:
     a.	High Brightness
     b.	Low Brightness
     c.	Gaussian Blur (3x3 kernel)
     d.	Zoom in (25%)
     e.	Rotate Right (angle of 20)
     f.	        Rotate Left (angle of -20)
3.	After collecting all the samples and performing data augmentation there will be between 12600-18900 images in the dataset.

4.	The division of the Dataset is: 10% Testing, 90% Training (You can divide the training to validation and train however you like)

5.	Images size is 50x50.

The Traffic signs are:
1.	Stop Sign.

3.	Access Denied Sign.
4.	Close Road Sign.
5.	30 Speed Limit Sign.
